concept.title: readme_markup_lite
concept.conbody:
>
Description
MarkUP Lite enables you to convert your Markdown files to DITA by performing the following actions:
Move the MarkUP Lite.exe file to the directory that contains your Markdown (.md, .MD, .markdown, .MARKDOWN) files.
Open the MarkUP Lite.exe and accept all security prompts that may appear.
Dependencies
MarkUP Lite uses "markdown2dita" to convert Markdown to DITA. "markdown2dita" uses "mustune" to parse Markdown.
